hero.title: We Build Beautiful
hero.subtitle: Based in sunny Cyprus, we're a sister duo crafting stunning websites, professional email solutions, and complete digital experiences for businesses ready to shine online.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: From concept to launch and beyond, we provide everything you need for a successful online presence.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: From WordPress sites to custom web apps with Laravel, React, Next.js & Tailwind. We build what your business needs.
webDevelopment.fullDescription: We craft stunning, high-performance websites and web applications tailored to your unique business needs. Whether you need a simple landing page or a complex e-commerce platform, we've got you covered.

hostingMaintenance.title: Hosting & Maintenance
hostingMaintenance.description: Reliable hosting solutions with ongoing maintenance to keep your site secure, fast, and always online.
hostingMaintenance.fullDescription: Rest easy knowing your website is in safe hands. We provide premium hosting with 99.9% uptime, regular backups, security monitoring, and proactive maintenance to keep your site running smoothly.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Beautiful, user-friendly designs that capture your brand essence and engage your audience effectively.
webDesign.fullDescription: We work closely with our creative partners to deliver exceptional web designs that combine aesthetics with functionality. Every design is crafted to reflect your brand identity and provide an outstanding user experience.

emailSignaturesNewsletters.title: Email Signatures & Newsletters
emailSignaturesNewsletters.description: Professional email signatures and newsletter templates that make every communication an opportunity to impress.
emailSignaturesNewsletters.fullDescription: Transform every email into a branding opportunity. We work with our partners to create professionally designed email signatures and newsletter templates that work perfectly across all email clients and devices.

services.partnerServiceNotice: This service is delivered in close collaboration with our trusted partners who share our commitment to quality and excellence.

about.title: The Sisters Behind
story: We're two sisters from the beautiful island of Cyprus, united by our love for design and technology. What started as a shared passion has grown into a creative partnership that brings websites and digital experiences to life.

Working as a duo gives us a unique advantage: two perspectives, double the creativity, and a natural collaboration that our clients love. We bring the best of both worlds – technical precision and creative flair – to every project we take on.
When we're not coding or designing, you'll find us exploring Cyprus's stunning coastlines, sipping coffee at local cafés, and finding inspiration in the Mediterranean lifestyle that shapes our work.

love.title: Made with Love
love.description: Every project gets our full dedication and personal touch.

creativity.title: Creative Solutions
creativity.description: We blend creativity with technical expertise for unique results.

connection.title: Personal Connection
connection.description: We work closely with you, understanding your vision and goals.

portfolio.title: Our Work
portfolio.description: Projects we've brought to life with passion and precision.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it – hear from the businesses we've helped transform

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Create Together
contact.description: Ready to start your project? Reach out and let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.
contact.responseTime: We typically respond within 24-48 hours. Looking forward to hearing from you!
